questions.question_text: "projection" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: An estimate or prediction about future trends
questions.example_sentence: The report includes sales projections for the next fiscal year.
questions.explanation:
予測・見通し
顧客調査
規制
製造装置

questions.question_text: "fluctuate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To decrease due to legal issues
questions.example_sentence: Market demand is expected to fluctuate during the first half of the year.
questions.explanation:
変動する
安定上昇する
固定される
法的問題で減少する

questions.question_text: "sector" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A specific part of the economy or industry
questions.example_sentence: The technology sector is projected to grow faster than other industries.
questions.explanation:
部門・産業分野
倉庫のエリア
新人研修
販促イベント

questions.question_text: "stability" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The state of being steady and not changing suddenly
A decline caused by supply shortages
questions.example_sentence: Analysts note signs of stability in consumer spending patterns.
questions.explanation:
安定
急成長
割引戦略
供給不足による減少

questions.question_text: "anticipate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To expect or look forward to something
To reduce the quality of a product
questions.example_sentence: Economists anticipate moderate growth in the second quarter.
questions.explanation:
予測する・期待する
意図的に遅らせる
品質を下げる
機械を交換する
